SecretKeyForTokenValidation.Comments_On_JWT_SecretKeys_Min_Length: Note that JWT Secret Keys must be 128 bits for HMAC:SHA256; Since 1 char equals 1 byte in Extended ASCII and 1 byte equals 8bits therefore secret key string should be 16 chars long
SecretKeyForTokenValidation.Comments_On_JWT_SecretKeys_On_Backend_an: Front end and backend secret keys must be same, front end secret key is stored on Angular web server/appsettings
